document_title: Acne: Causes, symptoms and risks you need to know
subsection_content:
Complications of acne often occur in people with darker skin, including:
Scars: Complications of pitted skin (acne scars) and thickened skin (keloid scars) can persist long after the acne has healed.; Skin changes: after acne clears, the affected skin area may be darker (hyperpigmentation) or lighter (hypopigmentation) than before the acne.
